latestAction.text: On agreeing to the Fox amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
On agreeing to the Fox amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 171 - 257 (Roll no. 824).

Mr. Regula raised a point of order against the Fox amendment (A030). Mr. Regula stated that the provisions of the amendment seek to amend text that has been previously amended, and is therefore not in order. The Chair sustained the point of order.
By unanimous consent, the Fox amendment was withdrawn.
